creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Fragment of eccentric tapestry border for priest's robe. Two pieces sewn together. Divided into four patterned areas separated by red bands. Figures and animals in the four sections are abstracted into all over pattern. Yellow, brown, green, red, and black. Badly frayed on three corners.
title: Fragment of Robe Border
